info.title: SalesOS API
info.description: SalesOS is an AI-powered Sales CRM and Revenue Intelligence platform. This API provides programmatic access to CRM data, sales coaching, CPQ, and more.

name.description: Full name (used if firstName/lastName not provided)

organizationCode.description: Organization registration code (required for enterprise access)

picklistValues.description: Picklist values for PICKLIST or MULTI_PICKLIST types

fieldType.description: Field type (cannot be changed after creation)

isStandard.description: Is this the standard price book

assignmentRuleId.description: Assignment rule ID to apply to leads
